mentionedBy.notes: 2D drafting and 3D modeling with AutoCAD-like interface

mentionedBy.name: Autodesk Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Easy to use, easy to learn, and costs significantly less than other CAD software. Preserves command-line workflow familiar to AutoCAD users but extends functionality with parametric constraints and design automation. More efficient in handling large point clouds and complex 3D models.

2020.note: 2D drafting and 3D modeling with AutoCAD-like interface

2025.note: Easy to use, easy to learn, and costs significantly less than other CAD software. Preserves command-line workflow familiar to AutoCAD users but extends functionality with parametric constraints and design automation. More efficient in handling large point clouds and complex 3D models.
